localize.title: Buzzing on Product Hunt
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Product Hunt in your native language

nodes.excerpt: Characterz 2 is a diverse 3D library thanks to which you can do more than 100,000,000 combinations of 3D characters. Mix & Match style. Use it in your products/projects, personal/marketing purposes, etc.
nodes.title: CHARACTERZ 2 - The biggest 3D illustrations library in the world
nodes.author: Samuel Briskar

nodes.excerpt: A huge 3D icons pack featuring 4000+ icons in 2 viewpoint versions (front & perspective), 5 premade color palettes, PNG files and a Figma file where you can customize their colors, with a built-in search function where you can find exactly the ones you need!
nodes.title: 3D Icons 2.0 by Iconshock - 4000+ 3D icons in 4K resolution, Figma included
nodes.author: Juan Sarmiento

nodes.excerpt: When building products on the web, mobile or desktop, you often needs favicons (logos of websites). Icon Horse was born from that need â€“ one simple URL for any given website you can embed in your app. And if it can't find an icon, it serves a fallback!
nodes.title: Icon Horse - Dead simple & easy to use favicons for any website
nodes.author: Mike T

nodes.excerpt: ğŸ´ Flagpack is an open source project of 250+ stunning flag icons for your digital product. Easily implementable in your design or code project. Now with Figma Variants and Svelte Components.
nodes.title: Flagpack V2 - Stunning flag icons for your digital product
nodes.author: Vince Schwidder

nodes.excerpt: A pack of super cool 3D shapes to use in your projects. With customizable tones, surface textures, and colors, these high-resolution shapes are perfect for creating beautiful presentations, posters, apps, websites, and more!
nodes.title: 3DMADE - A pack of customizable 3D shapes for Figma
nodes.author: Akash Tyagi

nodes.excerpt: SVG Gobbler is an open source browser extension that helps make designing and developing easier by finding, processing, exporting, optimizing, and managing vector content.
nodes.title: SVG Gobbler - Download, optimize, and process vector SVGs
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: 3D App icons set for personal devices and commercial projects. Feel free to use them as your home-screen refreshment or asset for next commercial project.
nodes.title: Clayio - 3D App icons for personal devices and commercial projects
nodes.author: Maciej Nowak

nodes.excerpt: Streamline 4.0 is the simplest way to find and adapt icons, illustrations, and emojis. It contains the most complete, consistent, and distinctive UI sets in a feature-rich app all under one roof. Get it for free.
nodes.title: Streamline 4.0 - 100,000 icons, illustrations, & emojis, customize in seconds
nodes.author: Marc KÃ¶hlbrugge

nodes.excerpt: Carelessly designed Doodle icons for your next Project's Wireframe. Support for SVG and your favourite design tool. Completely free and open source.
nodes.title: Doodlicons - Carelessly  designed doodle icons for your next project
nodes.author: Rahul Singh Bhadoriya

nodes.excerpt: VectorIcons Mixer is a simple online tool that allows you to mix & match thousands of vector icons with colorful shapes to generate new icon sets with a few clicks. There are lots of icon styles & hundreds of abstract, geometric & organic shapes to combine!
nodes.title: VectorIcons Mixer by Iconshock - Get thousands of free icon variations using colorful shapes
nodes.author: Juan Sarmiento

nodes.excerpt: Iconoir is a constantly evolving open-source SVG icons library with more than 900 icons. No premium icons, no email sign-up, no newsletters.
nodes.title: Iconoir - A diverse and open-source library with 900+ icons
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Nucleo is a free icon manager for Mac and Windows. Use it to import, organize, and export all your icons. Optionally, you can purchase the Nucleo icons, a library of 30K icons that work seamlessly with the app.
nodes.title: Nucleo 3 - Icon manager for Mac and Windows
nodes.author: Sebastiano Guerriero

nodes.excerpt: Iconic is a free, ever-growing collection of pixel-perfect icons. New icons added every week. 150 icons and counting (.svg,png,fig). Enjoy ğŸ˜˜
nodes.title: âš¡ï¸Iconic - Free, â€œdo wtf you want withâ€ pixel-perfect icons.
nodes.author: James

nodes.excerpt: Iconduck is a collection of 146 (and counting) open source icon and illustration sets. â € They can be searched through and downloaded, and are available for personal and commercial purposes (depending on the license, some may request a backlink).
nodes.title: Iconduck - 113,524 free open source icons & illustrations
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: This set includes replacement icons inicns andjpg format covering 250+ applications in 2 different styles. It's optimized for MacOS Big Sur and iOS 14.
nodes.title: Ultimate Icon Pack - Big Sur & iOS 14 icon pack covering 250+ apps in 2 styles
nodes.author: Benedikt Matern

nodes.excerpt: Snap viewers out their doom scrolling with lively animated icons. With 3000+ easy-to-use graphics, you can build consistent apps, stores, and brands without the extra time or expense. - 20 popular styles - Tagged and searchable platform - Multiple formats
nodes.title: Animated Icons 3 - 3000+ engaging motion graphics by Icons8
nodes.author: Ivan

nodes.excerpt: Poser is a vector illustration pack that includes 20 unique illustrated poses that can be used to emphasize key features of your products and/or services. We have a 25% discount for Product Hunt buyers https://gumroad.com/l/YkhLs/poser-25-ph

nodes.excerpt: Universal Icon Set v2.0 is finally ready. 1671 icons in total. High-quality icon set for websites, apps, social networks, prints, billboards and even for a postcard for your mom.
nodes.title: Universal Icon Set 2.0 - 557 icons in 3 styles

nodes.excerpt: Google Fonts gets new logo as catalog adds iconography, starting with Material Icons.

nodes.excerpt: Free pack of 192 avatars and 6 colored backgrounds. Perfect for Notion.

nodes.excerpt: Free medicine 3d icons pack for you project which you can easily customise with Figma or Sketch. - 21 unique icons - Hi-res images - Compatible with Figma and Sketch - Everything clear, grouped and easy to use - Instructions included

nodes.excerpt: Update your phones look with over 4,500 aesthetic icons made by pro designers and trending Dribbble artists. Our iOS app makes it easy to browse aesthetic themes and download any icon you want â€“from minimal monochromes to Futurama characters. Plus, itâ€™s free!
